text: Gedeyɔn yi na xɛmaan nafala saraxarali domana nde ra, a yi a lu Ofara taani. Isirayila kaane birin yi fama mɛnna nin na batudeni naxan yi luxi alo yalunyana Ala yɛtagi,8.27 Na luxi nɛn alo yalunyana Ala yɛɛ ra yi bayo Ala waxi nɛn a yamaan xa tinxin a xa alo ɲaxanla lan a xa tinxin a xɛmɛn xa kii naxan yi.  na yi findi maratantan seen na Gedeyɔn nun a denbayaan xa.
